Description: Blue glazed composition reis shabti of Nbt pr Šmʿyt-Imn T3... with black painted detail: a lappet-wig tied with a fillet, a modelled face with traced eyes and one arm held across the chest in relief holding a whip; the apron and ankle are inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
